PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-04002021-05-14,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC,  GAC,  TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Fees in Respect of the Replacement of Identity and Travel Documents (Reclaimed Names) Remission Order
PrecisCERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF THE REPLACEMENT OF IDENTITY AND TRAVEL DOCUMENTS (RECLAIMED NAMES) REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the fees related to the issuance of certificates of identity, refugee travel documents, permanent resident cards, and citizenship certificates for Indigenous persons seeking to replace the above-mentioned documents with one that displays their reclaimed name, as detailed within Call to Action 17 of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission of Canada’s 2015 report.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0023 Publication Date: 2021-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certain Fees in Respect of the Replacement of Identity and Travel Documents (Reclaimed Names) Remission Order
precis: CERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF THE REPLACEMENT OF IDENTITY AND TRAVEL DOCUMENTS (RECLAIMED NAMES) REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the fees related to the issuance of certificates of identity, refugee travel documents, permanent resident cards, and citizenship certificates for Indigenous persons seeking to replace the above-mentioned documents with one that displays their reclaimed name, as detailed within Call to Action 17 of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission of Canada’s 2015 report.
